verses.name: Isaiah 8:14
verses.text: And he shall be for a sanctuary; but for a stone of stumbling and for a rock of offence to both the houses of Israel, for a gin and for a snare to the inhabitants of Jerusalem.

verses.name: Isaiah 8:15
verses.text: And many among them shall stumble, and fall, and be broken, and be snared, and be taken.

verses.name: Isaiah 8:16
verses.text: Bind up the testimony, seal the law among my disciples.

verses.name: Isaiah 8:17
verses.text: And I will wait upon the Lord, that hideth his face from the house of Jacob, and I will look for him.
